sentences.en: As soon as we realized something was wrong, we moved the children away.
sentences.cn: 我们一意识到出了问题，就立即把孩子们转移开了。

sentences.en: Do they realize we are racing towards complete economic collapse?
sentences.cn: 他们意识到我们的经济马上要彻底崩溃了吗？

sentences.en: Do you realize, woman, the scandal and publicity that will be involved?
sentences.cn: 臭婆娘，你知不知道这会恶名远扬？

sentences.en: Don't you realize what a scare you've given us all?
sentences.cn: 你难道不知道你把我们大家都吓得不轻吗？

sentences.en: He didn't realize that he was wrong up till the present moment.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止他还没意识到他错了.

sentences.en: He didn't realize what a gaffe he'd made.
sentences.cn: 他没意识到自己已出乖露丑.

sentences.en: He doesn't think you realize the gravity of the situation.
sentences.cn: 他认为你没意识到局势的严重性.

sentences.en: I didn't realize how heavy that shopping was going to be.
sentences.cn: 我没想到买的东西会有多沉。

sentences.en: I realize there's no consensus on what are male or female values.
sentences.cn: 我意识到人们对什么是男性价值观和什么是女性价值观并无共识。

sentences.en: It took us a while to realize the extent of the tragedy.
sentences.cn: 我们过了一段时间才意识到这场悲剧有多严重。

sentences.en: It was only later that I realized my mistake.
sentences.cn: 我到后来才认识到自己的错误。

sentences.en: Only later did he realize the full seriousness of his offence.
sentences.cn: 他后来才意识到他的罪行有多严重.

sentences.en: Only then did he realize that he had been wrong.
sentences.cn: 直到这时他才知道他错了.

sentences.en: People don't realize how serious this recession has actually been.
sentences.cn: 人们没有意识到这次经济衰退有多么严重。

sentences.en: Rest assured, he probably has rather more common sense than you realize.
sentences.cn: 放心吧，他知道的常识很可能比你以为的要多得多。

sentences.en: She never realized her ambition of winning an Olympic gold medal.
sentences.cn: 中文例句:她一直未能实现赢取奥运会金牌的抱负。

sentences.en: She was mortified to realize he had heard every word she said.
sentences.cn: 她意识到自己的每句话都被他听到了，直羞得无地自容。

sentences.en: The Emperor must realize that he has us at his mercy.
sentences.cn: 皇帝必须意识到我们任由他处置。

sentences.en: We realize that we are infinitely small within the scheme of things.
sentences.cn: 我们认识到在大千世界中我们极其渺小。

sentences.en: You don't have to be a pessimist to realize that we're in trouble.
sentences.cn: 不是悲观论者也能意识到我们有了麻烦。

words.tran_cn: [数] 可实现的；可实行的；可感觉到的
实际上，事实上；真正地，真实地；真的吗？（表语气）
现实主义；实在论；现实主义的态度和行为
实现（realize的过去式及过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 变卖产业；变卖产业以得现款

trans.tran_cn: 实现；认识到；了解；将某物卖得，把(证券等)变成现钱；变卖
trans.tran_en: to know and understand something, or suddenly begin to understand it

trans.tran_cn: 实现，了解，意识到，（所担心的事）发生，以…价格卖出
trans.tran_en: If you realize that something is true, you become aware of that fact or understand it
